## CreateAssetAndReplaceReferencePayload interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CreateAssetAndReplaceReferencePayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [accessor](./redux-feature-batch.createassetandreplacereferencepayload.accessor.md) | <code>string</code> | The accessor string (e.g. elements.image.id) that points to the content property that needs to be updated with the asset id. |
|  [asset](./redux-feature-batch.createassetandreplacereferencepayload.asset.md) | <code>AuthoringAsset</code> | Optionally an asset that is used as a baseline. The action will copy the relevant metadata from this asset. |
|  [assetId](./redux-feature-batch.createassetandreplacereferencepayload.assetid.md) | <code>string</code> | The id of the asset to create. Typcially this is an auto generated ID on the client side. |
|  [contentItemId](./redux-feature-batch.createassetandreplacereferencepayload.contentitemid.md) | <code>string</code> | The content item to update. |
|  [file](./redux-feature-batch.createassetandreplacereferencepayload.file.md) | <code>File</code> | The file to upload. |
